label: A2BC2_tP10_129_ac_c_bc-001
title: CaBe$_{2}$Ge$_{2}$ Structure
comments:
This is a ternary form of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A4B_tI10_139_de_a-001}{$D1_{3}$ (BaAl$_{4}$) structure}.  The atomic positions are approximately the same as in the conventional cell of BaAl$_{4}$, but the distribution of the atoms on those sites and the resulting relaxation leads to a different structure. 
 Space group $P4/nmm$ \#129 has two settings, but both have the same $z$-axis origin, so either setting will do here.  We chose our standard setting 2.
